name: Mustang Survival Highwater 22L Waterproof Backpack
description:
A light and tough dry bag, with shoulder straps for convenient portages. The dunk-proof design is ready for unexpected swims, and exterior pockets provide easy access to items you need on the regular.Durable and fully waterproof 70-denier ripstop nylon shell.Roll-top closure seals out water.Padded shoulder straps and stermum strap.3 exterior mesh pockets provide access to frequently used items.Note: these dry bags do not provide submersible waterproof protection or impact protection. For electronics, we recommend hard cases with gasket seals.

        Sustainability
